PathOfBuilding.Notes:
LARGE JEWELS:
Attack Damage - Heavy Hitter 64k - Deep Cuts 300k - Vicious Skewering 100k - Martial Prowess 100k - Smite the Weak 100k Attack Damage while Dual Wielding: Combat Rhytm 65k - Deadly Repartee 115k - Instaiable Killer 76k - Hit and Run 42k - Quick and Deadly 180k - Vicious Skewering 100k Physical Damage: Force Multiplier 90k - Battle Hardened 80k - Iron Breaker 80k(should be better) - Master the Fundamentals 80k - Furious Assault 115k
Devastator 45k
Combat Rhytm 65k
MEDIUM JEWELS:
Area Damage: Magnifier 65k - Assert Dominance 25k Channeling: Hex Breaker 61k - Enduring Focus 61k - Precise Focus 205k - Unwavering Focus 53k - Stoic Focus 53k - Vital Focus 64k Critical Strike Chance: Precise Commander 150k - Basics of Pain 100k - Provocateur 125k - Pressure Point 75k (doesnt calculate double dmg) - Skullbreaker 60k - Quick Getaway 81k
SMALL JEWELS:
Life: Wall of Muscle 8k - Adrenaline 35k
Large Jewels: Attack Damage: Deep Cuts - Vicious Skewering - Martial Prowess - Smite the Weak - Devastator - Heavy Hitter Attack Damage While Dual Wielding: Deep Cuts - Quick and Deadly - Deadly Repartee - Vicious Skewering - Martial Prowess - Smite the Weak - Instaiable Killer - Devastator - Heavy Hitter Dagger and Claw: Deep Cuts - Wind Up - Vicious Skewering - Martial Prowess - Smite the Weak - Heavy Hitter - Devastator Physical Damage: Furious Assault - Iron Breaker - Master the Fundementals - Battle Hardened - Force Multiplier
Medium Jewels: Area Damage: Magnifier - Assert Dominance Channeling Skills Damage: Precise Focus - Hex Breaker - Enduring Focus - Vital Focus - Stoic Focus - Unwavering Focus Critical Chance: Precise Commander - Pressure Point - Basics of Pain - Quick Getaway - Magnifier - Skullbreaker
S TIER JEWEL NODES: Deep Cuts 300k - Precise Focus 190k - Quick and Deadly 180k (use 2 different weapons) - Precise Commander 150k - Wind up 60k (But Power Charges add 250k)
A TIER JEWEL NODES: Provocateur 125k - Deadly Repartee 115k - Furious Assault 115k - Iron Breaker 80k (But is actually better)
B TIER JEWEL NODES: Vicious Skewering 100k - Martial Prowess 100k - Smite the Weak 100k - Basics of Pain 100k - Force Multiplier 90k - Battle Hardened 80k(+Armour/Evasion) - Master the Fundamentals 80k (+% Resists) Pressure Point 75k (doesnt calculate double dmg) - Quick Getaway 81k (5% Movement Speed) - Hex Breaker 61k (Immune to Curses)
C TIER JEWEL NODES: Combat Rhytm 65k (10% Movement Speed) - Instaiable Killer 76k - Enduring Focus 61k (Gives Endurance Charges) - Devastator 45k (15% Chance to Explode - Almost B Tier)
D TIER JEWEL NODES: Magnifier 65k - Heavy Hitter 64k - Vital Focus 64k - Skullbreaker 60k - Stoic Focus 53k - Unwavering Focus 53k - Assert Dominance 25k (But gives decent AoE)
F TIER JEWEL NODES: Hit and Run 42k
+1 Melee Strike Range = 0.5cm 20% Area of Effect = 1cm
